descriptionWindow.title: At FUMITRADE, we are not just fumigation experts ‚Äì we are paving the way in agricultural protection
descriptionWindow.text: We have over 30 years of experience, becoming leaders in fumigation and processing of grain and oilseed crops. Safety, efficiency, and innovation have always been at the heart of our work, and we continue to raise industry standards.

trustUsWindow.we_are_trusted_text: We take on both large and small projects, providing efficiency and reliability others cannot offer

servicesWindow.we_offer_comprehensive_pest_control_solu: We offer comprehensive pest control solutions. Choose the service you need:

service_1.title: Grain fumigation
service_1.description: Treatment of grain with phosphine gas applied in tablet form into the grain mass.	Requires sealing of the grain mass on-floor elevators with film.

service_2.title: Aerosol disinsection
service_2.description: Aerosol disinsection, also known as fogging, is used to treat empty premises before loading a new crop. The principle involves fine spraying of liquid insecticide using:	Hot fog generators (with light oil)	Airflow atomizers (with water)

service_3.title: Mill fumigation
service_3.description: Fumigation of mills allows for the effective destruction of pests in dust or in mill structures. The procedure is carried out using gas fumigants, which ensures the penetration of the drug into hard-to-reach places. Fumigation is carried out in sealed conditions with subsequent control of gas concentration and degassing before using the premises.	The consumption rate of the phosphine drug is from 4 g/m¬≥	The exposure time is up to 10 days

service_4.title: Grain	fumigation	without	transfer
service_4.description: The technology of grain fumigation in silos without transfer (movement) was developed by us based on thirty years of experience in the field of fumigation. Before the war, it underwent two years of testing at the following elevators: Kherson KHP, Bratolyubov KHP, Agrotrade 2000 and Zlynkiv new elevator.	We guarantee 100% quality of work!

service_5.title: Deratization
service_5.description: We carry out deratization activities in accordance with HACCP standards, installing deratization stations of our own design, which differ from similar ones in the period between maintenance. Traps are installed in places of rodent activity, and their location is monitored and adjusted for maximum effect. Advantages of our company's traps:	Quick installation	Small size	The period between maintenance is 1 month

contactsPage.mainTitle: Write to us and we will find a solution to your problems!

We‚Äôre paving the way in crop protection!

With over 30 years of experience, we‚Äôve become leaders in fumigation and treatment of grain and oilseed crops. Safety, efficiency, and innovation have always been at the core of our work, and we continue to raise industry standards by ensuring the highest quality.

We take on both large and small projects, delivering effectiveness and reliability that others can‚Äôt match.
about-us.quote:
Our mission is to provide a full range of pest control services to minimize business losses.

And to do it according to international standards using the latest methods.
